DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare percutaneous tibial nerve stimulation ( PTNS ) drug therapy treatment symptom overactive bladder ( OAB ) .
DOC.brief_title: Overactive Bladder Innovative Therapy Trial ( OrBIT )
DOC.criteria: Is least 18 year age Experiences OAB void frequency least 8 time per day Is ambulatory able use toilet independently without difficulty On OAB pharmacotherapy within previous month Primary complaint stress urinary incontinence Has pacemaker implantable defibrillator Has history heart problem Has nerve damage neuropathy Has gastric urinary retention Has uncontrolled narrowangle glaucoma Has know sensitivity drug ingredient Is pregnant plan become pregnant trial
DOC.keyword: OAB symptom urgency , frequency , urge incontinence
